name: DuckDuckGo - Duck Custom
description:
You can change the orange accents (e.g., the duck's round frame) in DuckDuckGo's page to a different color (e.g., green or black) to match your preferences with this style. The style also gives you the choice of a black duck instead of a white one. Changing the page background color is an option in DuckDuckGo. I created the style to match my DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Custom style, featured in some screenshots.
(At the moment this style is only effective with Firefox.)
